markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grim Trophy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2979)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman comes in many forms, most often a severed piece of a humanoid creature displayed in some gruesome manner. When you activate the trophy, make an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)  check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) up to two targets, comparing your Intimidation check result to both of their DCs

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Grim Trophy
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Grim Trophy (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can Demoralize up to three targets, comparing your Intimidation check result to all three of their DCs.
name: Grim Trophy
